stages.task: Run **/garage** to see your car you've obtained
Run **/race [street race] [car ID] [tier 1]** to race with your car
Run **/dealer parts** to view the parts available for purchase
Run **/garage** and click the **parts button** to view your parts
Run **/upgrade [car id] t1exhaust** to upgrade your car
Run **/race [street race] [car ID] [tier 1]** to race with your upgraded car
Run **/barn** to find a barn car to restore
Run **/restore [car id]** to see what parts you need to restore your barn car
Run **/junkyard** to find junk parts to restore your barn car
Run **/restore [car id]** to restore your car completely
Click the **season** button on the events drop down menu to view the season event
Run **/season** to view the current season
Click the **claim** button to claim your rewards
